title: Lets implement QDA by ourself
description: Who needs models, just do statsticsFirst of all, 95% of the kernel is stolen from Chris, I just exchanged QDA with heuristic statistics. The main point is, that if we assume our variables to be multivariate normal distributed (which we know from the make_classification function) we can just calcuate the probability that a data point belongs to either of the two ellipses by calculating probablities.
